name: GKVoiceChat.PlayerState
desc: The state of a player in a voice chat.

items.name: case connected
items.desc: The state when the player connects to the channel.

items.name: case disconnected
items.desc: The state when the player left the channel.

items.name: case speaking
items.desc: The state when the player speaks.

items.name: case silent
items.desc: The state when the player isn’t speaking.

items.name: case connecting
items.desc: The state when the player is connecting to the channel, but isn’t connected yet.
